website_summaries.verdict: These make great gifts for candle enthusiasts, and are a welcome surprise when guests find your white candles dripping in bold red, blue, yellow, and orange hues.
pros: Drips in distinct rainbow colors as it melts

customer_reviews.title: Love these candles!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these candles! If you’re going for that authentic macabre, dripping wax, look, this is the candles you want. Pretty sure these guys sold candles to the phantom of the opera, they’ve been around that long! Seriously, these candles are awesome! Disclaimer: several other multi drip candles have been burned on this bottle, prior to this photo being taken. About 4-5 candles will produce this amount of build up. However, the first candle was burned on it 4-5 years, and 2-3 moves ago. So, A+ for wax durability and longevity!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corny romantics, get out those wine bottles
customer_reviews.text: My husband, bless his heart, likes candles in chianti bottles but standard tapers don't drip enough to satisfy him so I thought we'd try these. Well, they sure do drip! And because that's what they are made to do, they burn rather quickly. You will get a few candlelit dinners from them, but don't expect them to get you through a blackout. For my taste, there's a lot more dripping than I'd like, but my husband thinks they're great.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn E. Etier

customer_reviews.title: Be careful where you place the bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun, hippie throwback (and I am, or was, a fun hippie) so when we went to dinner and they brought one of those chianti bottles in a straw thingie, I just had to get these. They work great, drip fast and colorfully, but they drip a bit too fast. Make sure you place the bottle on a cleanable surface about the size of a placemat. I used an old school tray. Now that the bottle has been decorated, I use non-drip candles and get the best of both worlds. Oh, and the base of the candle will probably have to be whittled away to fit the neck of the bottle.
